name: Song Mix
description: Base mixing service for songs with up to 50 tracks

name: High Track Count Mix
description: Mixing service for songs with more than 50 tracks

name: Standard Master
description: Professional mastering for songs up to 10 minutes

name: Extended Length Master
description: Professional mastering for songs over 10 minutes

name: Project Mix Revision
description: Request mix changes to any/all songs in a project

name: Project Mastering Revision
description: Request mastering changes to any/all songs in a project
